Name: Pill Puzzle
About the game: Always paying attention to the color, type and position of the tablets, you will need to fit one tablet at a time, in the right order, to complete the pack. Rotate pills Put it in the right color Change position And delivered to your customers Resources: 60 Levels. No time counter. Steam achievements.
